Class Player

java.lang.Object
  AbstractGameObject
      AbstractMovable
          Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameObject, java.io.Serializable, Movable, Solid
public class Player
extends AbstractMovable
implements Solid

The Player Class.

This class represents the playing Movable GameObject that is controlled by user input. It is stored within a World Object. It is Solid.

Since:
May 9, 2011
Version:
1.0.0.0 : May 9, 2011
Author:
Mihail Kurbako
See Also:
Movable, GameObject, Engine, Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(org.newdawn.slick.Image img,
              int initX,
              int initY,
              int height,
              int width)
Create a new instance of a Player Object. This Object is controlled by the user during game play.

Parameters:
img - The image for this Object to be rendered as.
initX - The initial X coordinate for this Object.
initY - The initial Y coordinate for this Object.
height - The vertical size for this Object.
width - The horizontal size for this Object.
